positive.review:
We choose to put the 5th wrecking ball on the 10th moving object coated in glue not to prove how good at platforming we are, but simply because it's funny.

As long as no one in your friend group is absurdly good at old-school Mario, you'll have a good time. Even then, you can adjust a lot of factors and find a mode/level/score modifier that works.
Very good game if you have friends if not randoms are fine aswell and you can just have the biggest laugh while trying to make the hardest levels
Favourite game on steam 100% challenge features + creative features 10/10 game
Great game! Infinite replayability. I thought they would stop updating it years ago, but nope! The content keeps coming. You wont regret buying.
I make my friends extremely angry at me and they all hate me because of this game, very funny. Prepare for my wrath of arrows and fireballs.

Bought when there was a good sale for around $5 and after owning the game on the switch version. This version I like better due to being able to play with others through steam remote play, which allows people to play with you even if they do not own the game. From what I have heard from others the game plays well with minimal lag as I am the one who hosts the game. Would recommend when on sale or have a group of friends each pitch in for one copy so one person can own the game and everyone can play. Looking forward to Ultimate Sheep Raccoon if that also supports remote play and plays as well or better than the original.

This game is super fun to play with friends , but get's pretty repetetitive and boring if you play it too often. It has fun maps, cool characters and other stuff. Overall I would rate this game a solid 8/10
Really fun party game, and gods is it fun fucking over my friends X3
great platformer and party game
Awesome party game! You don´t have to be in a party of 4 to enjoy it. Had an amazing time while playing it with my friend. Highly recommend!
This game is so fun to play with friends online! I love how simple the game is to play!

Very fun and simple party game. Each map has its own custom quirks and with every success or failure of reaching the checkpoint, the entire party must place more and more traps to build the map to be difficult just enough for their own success. The varying degrees of traps and possibilities allows this game to be an infinitely fun game to pick up and jump into any time.

great game, absolutely I recommend this game if you've got some friends that are down to play. Near infinite replay-ability, always a good time and never too heated, its just a fun game. would be nice if it were natively more than 4 players, or if they added workshop/mod support, but mods do exist through external sites. still, even with no mods (i havent ever played with mods anyways), this game is amazing.
Always absolute blast with friends, one of the greatest local couch games ever.
This game is the best solution for late night boredom with your friends.
Extremely addicting. One of my favorite party games already, even after playing for only a couple days.

Excellent party game and tons of room to get creative! The custom map creation could benefit from some added controls for keyboard/mouse, but it is on par with any other game geared toward controller use in that respect.

Ultimate Chicken Horse is an endlessly replayable game where everyone builds the level together. Since everyone's playing the same level, it's truly an even playing field. So when I lose, it feels like a personal attack of my ability. But when I win, it's like "in yo face B1TcH"

too bad my friends refunded the game. (i'm not even kidding, now i can only play with randoms)

This game is super duper fun. I always have fun making the. This game lets me be pink. Pink pretty princess. It also helps that i'm an ultimate parkour master not just in game but also irl. I feel like i'm high whenever I play UCH. Even though I have no idea what its like to be high. Trust me I have never been high, ever in my life. Im not lying. You have to believe be. Trust in my word. Sometimes I wonder what its like to be high and then I play this game. This game is what I think being high is. Anyways play this game with friends. If you don't have friends don't play this game. That's kinda sad to have no friends though. So if you need a friend just message me to play this game.
One of my favorite party games ive ever played. This has been a new staple party game to play with my friends ever since I got it. 10/10 did buy for my friends
I first bought this game on switch and loved it. When I found out that there was a steam version, I instantly bought it. This is one of the best party games ever made.

One of the most fun games ever to play with your friends, building your own silly race course with deadly traps set by yourself making you constantly adapt to the new level, amazing simply amazing (a MUST PLAY).

Absolutely sublime multiplayer game to play with friends. The unique scenarios that emerge after each build cycle are engaging, hilarious, and fundamentally connect each player's struggles and successes to the actions of their opponents. Top 5 multiplayer game of all time.

50/50:
cancer
not cancer
fun
not fun
possible
impossible
don't bother getting this game if you have no friends
its fun but public lobbies are usually not that good so i'd probably only recommend it if you have friends to play it with.
I can't stop chicken horsing, I can't stop chicken horsing, I can't stop chicken horsing

Heh. 

Being toxic against friends never felt this good.

10/10 The ULTIMATE PARTY GAME
fantastic fun with friends. should cost $5, with a three-pack at $15. could be further financed with costume microtransactions.
Alex doesnt want to lay this game tiwht me but its mad sick yo is rat e it 5 stars but my cat died tosay and im sad and i rate it a 4 insteaf i miss him yo
Great game if you enjoy casual gaming and chaos.
a chicken a horse and a sawblade, petas worst nightmare
This has maybe the most fun I had with my nephews and nices in a long time! proving that you don't need super high teck graphics or realistic themes to make a great videogame!
ultimate chicken horse is the party game of all time
veli fun gud wid flend cen bi veli fani situatiutatiuation
This game is VERY fun and REALLY caotic
Really good party game to play with friends, although you need friends.
wait this isnt the university of california health
THE GAME IS SO FUN WHEN THE PERSON THAT ONLY WINS BECAUSE OF THE COINTS ISNT PLAYING WITH US!!!!!!!
yea there is nothing better then insulting kids in chat without filters
this game has unleashed a demon filled with rage inside of me that no one has seen before
best game but defitly funner with friends trust me
its the best game in the world
Brings out more rage than Mario Kart. 4.5/5 would recommend.
it fun with freinds but when crashout you dead
fun game and stuff like that
the chicken and horse are very ultimate

fun with friends for like 10h
should be 5 bucks tops
super mario maker but you make your friends wanna come through your screen and beat the living hell out of you
its fun except for when you have to do the achievements
rucham w dupe kolege jebana owca mega polecam
Fun but only with friends
the dancing is insanly fun 12/10 game
chika bam, chika boom, ez  (your the ultimate chicken) :D
great multiplayer with friends
is good with friend will not discuss beyond that.
fun party game for 4 people
Сиега определил касту именно в этой игре
Peak game to play with friends.
Love this freakin game!!!! SO much fun!!!!
GOATed multiplayer game
Hilarious. 10/10 couch game.
greate for partys
Excelente Juego la verdad
such an exquisitely comedic game
sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo good worth the money fun game recomend

negative.review: Id Rather get my Balls Stuck in a conveyor belt then play this game again it feels like A big Black Dude Named Jamal is doing Jumping Jacks on my Cock and Balls

I wish I could recommend this game, but I just can't...

despite having been a competitive player, having gone through Terry's lessons and having been trained by really awesome competitive players a few years ago (memories that I'll cherish), the dev team and staff overall make stupid decisions and the new content of the game stinks. they're extremely anti-modding, thus preventing the community from expanding on the game for them for free, which is a huge shame, 'cause we have already 100% this game and its mechanics, and destroying newbs in lobbies quickly gets old (it is frustrating for them, the casu players will quickly disconnect) but at the same time hanging out with others competitives players also can lead to unfairness.

it could be better in matchmaking if it had some kind of ELO or ranking.

if you ever play this game, play with friends, and never try to get better at it (by learning in-depth mechanics), or if you do, all your friends should train too.

otherwise, you'd quickly become too good to the point where your friends would simply never win (happened to me until we all decided to simply stop playing it because I'd just steamroll it even if I play it drunk)

otherwise, except to get steamrolled by competitives players in casual lobbies with absolutely no chance of winning every now and then (as this is where we go when we want to just chill/relax and not play seriously)
awful bs game where 1 person can ruin all the fun with one single item( tried to return it but didnt work)
This game is only good if you have friends that are not dumb as rocks
Should be less expensive.
Id Rather get my Balls Stuck in a conveyor belt then play this game again it feels like A big Black Dude Named Jamal is doing Jumping Jacks on my Cock and Balls
Good, IF you pair a controller because playing with a mouse? IMPOSSIBLE for some reason. I honestly don't know why. But just pair a controller if you wanna play this game
its a game that will turn you autistic and gay oh and also black and a freak, overall 10/10

Unplayable with modern hardware.
You run as fast as a rabbit, while your opponents play in regular speed.
Nice for speedruns, but not for casual gaming.
Most of the players are just bots atp. Don't get this is you're looking to play with real online players, you'll just be playing with bots and maybe once in a while one real person.
awful bs game where 1 person can ruin all the fun with one single item( tried to return it but didnt work)
Turned into a mobile game made for babies. Horrible. One of the most awful experiences I've had in gaming.
